about_the_game:
You are a junior officer at Space Mining mega-corporation in the 23rd century Solar System. Violations will be punished: if you don't comply, you get gassed by cyanide and re-synthesized with a decreased IQ! Then you defect to other factions... And eventually become the mastermind of humanity.

Features:
- gather resources and produce troops like in an RTS game. But it's turn-based, and it works
- 6 factions, 8 campaigns, 100+ missions, with varying strategies depending on the chosen difficulty level
- dark humor on relatable topics like bureaucracy, lies and loneliness
- tweak any number in the game's rules and experiment with them in skirmish
- create your own missions, units and factions in the in-built editors

Let's together make the Solar System a better place!™

Note for letsplayers

I've licensed the music for this game. If you make a letsplay video for Youtube, please turn music off. Google may not let you upload the video because you don't own the licenses to the music

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Violations Will Be Punished Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A cyberpunk turn-based/real-time strategy hybrid. Gather minerals and produce units amidst dynamic turn-based battles. You work for a dystopian corporation but then discover your true destiny: to rule the world from the shadows.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support
